verses.verse: וַיֵּרָ֤א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD בְּאֵלֹנֵ֖י <S%H436><s%> be-'e-lo-Nei unto him in the plains מַמְרֵ֑א <S%H4471><s%> mam-Re; of Mamre וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev and he sat פֶּֽתַח־ <S%H6607><s%> pe-tach- door הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel in the tent כְּחֹ֥ם <S%H2527><s%> ke-Chom in the heat הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. of the day

וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa And he lift up עֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar, and looked וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah and lo three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim, men נִצָּבִ֖ים <S%H5324><s%> nitz-tza-Vim stood עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; opposite וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar, by him and when he saw וַיָּ֤רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vai-Ya-rotz [them] he ran לִקְרָאתָם֙ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Tam to meet מִפֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> mip-Pe-tach door הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel, them from the tent וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu and bowed אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. himself toward the ground

וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; And said אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nai, my lord אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na now מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti if now I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thy sight אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na please תַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> ta-'a-Vor pass not away מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha. I pray thee from thy servant

יֻקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> yuk-kach- be fetched נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na I pray you מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> me-'at- Let a little מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, water וְרַחֲצ֖וּ <S%H7364><s%> ve-ra-cha-Tzu and wash רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7272><s%> rag-lei-Chem; your feet וְהִֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <S%H8172><s%> ve-hish-sha-'a-Nu and rest yourselves תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הָעֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz. under the tree

וְאֶקְחָ֨ה <S%H3947><s%> ve-'ek-Chah And I will fetch פַת־ <S%H6595><s%> fat- a morsel לֶ֜חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem of bread וְסַעֲד֤וּ <S%H5582><s%> ve-sa-'a-Du and comfort ye לִבְּכֶם֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Chem your hearts אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char after that תַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <S%H5674><s%> ta-'a-Vo-ru, ye shall pass on כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- to כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So עֲבַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5674><s%> 'a-var-Tem for therefore are ye come עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עַבְדְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5650><s%> 'av-de-Chem; your servant וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, as thou hast said כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh So do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta. And they said

וַיְמַהֵ֧ר <S%H4116><s%> vay-ma-Her hastened אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham הָאֹ֖הֱלָה <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-he-lah into the tent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׂרָ֑ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah; unto Sarah וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said מַהֲרִ֞י <S%H4116><s%> ma-ha-Ri Make ready quickly שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three סְאִים֙ <S%H5429><s%> se-'Im measures קֶ֣מַח <S%H7058><s%> Ke-mach meal סֹ֔לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let, of fine ל֖וּשִׁי <S%H3888><s%> Lu-shi knead וַעֲשִׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-Si upon the hearth עֻגֽוֹת׃ <S%H5692><s%> u-Got. cakes

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to הַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar unto the herd רָ֣ץ <S%H7323><s%> ratz ran אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; And Abraham וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and fetcht בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted בָּקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar to the herd רַ֤ךְ <S%H7390><s%> rach tender וָטוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> va-tOv and good וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and gave אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar, [it] unto a young man וַיְמַהֵ֖ר <S%H4116><s%> vay-ma-Her and he hasted לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to dress אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he took חֶמְאָ֜ה <S%H2529><s%> chem-'Ah butter וְחָלָ֗ב <S%H2461><s%> ve-cha-Lav, and milk וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar bull אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, which he had dressed וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem; [it] before them וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- and he עֹמֵ֧ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med and he stood עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz by them under the tree וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> vai-yo-Che-lu. and they did eat

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵׅלָׅ֔יׅוׅ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, unto אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> 'ai-Yeh unto him Where שָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah [is] Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Te-cha; ess וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh There בָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> va-'O-hel. Behold in the tent

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said שׁ֣וֹב <S%H7725><s%> Shov I will certainly אָשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shuv return אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ka-'Et unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah, of life וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold בֵ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> ven shall have a son לְשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> le-sa-Rah and lo Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Te-cha; thy wife וְשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> ve-sa-Rah And Sarah שֹׁמַ֛עַת <S%H8085><s%> sho-Ma-'at heard פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach door הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel [it] in the tent וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu which אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav. which [was] behind him

וְאַבְרָהָ֤ם <S%H85><s%> ve-'av-ra-Ham Now Abraham וְשָׂרָה֙ <S%H8283><s%> ve-sa-Rah and Sarah זְקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> ze-ke-Nim, [were] old בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im [and] well stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim; in age חָדַל֙ <S%H2308><s%> cha-Dal [and] it ceased לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become לְשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H8283><s%> le-sa-Rah, to be with Sarah אֹ֖רַח <S%H734><s%> 'O-rach after the manner כַּנָּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> kan-na-Shim. of women

וַתִּצְחַ֥ק <S%H6711><s%> vat-titz-Chak laughed שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah Therefore Sarah בְּקִרְבָּ֣הּ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bah within herself לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei After בְלֹתִי֙ <S%H1086><s%> ve-lo-Ti I am waxed old הָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-tah- have לִּ֣י li עֶדְנָ֔ה <S%H5730><s%> 'ed-Nah, shall I have pleasure וַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> va-do-Ni my lord זָקֵֽן׃ <S%H2204><s%> za-Ken. being old also

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; unto Abraham לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Wherefore זֶּה֩ <S%H2088><s%> zeh he צָחֲקָ֨ה <S%H6711><s%> tza-cha-Kah laugh שָׂרָ֜ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah did Sarah לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הַאַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> ha-'Af yet אֻמְנָ֛ם <S%H552><s%> 'um-Nam Shall I of a surety אֵלֵ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> 'e-Led bear וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni a child which זָקַֽנְתִּי׃ <S%H2204><s%> za-Kan-ti. am old

הֲיִפָּלֵ֥א <S%H6381><s%> ha-yip-pa-Le too hard מֵיְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Jehovah דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var; any thing לַמּוֹעֵ֞ד <S%H4150><s%> lam-mo-'Ed time אָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shuv I will return אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about כָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ka-'Et unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah of life וּלְשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> u-le-sa-Rah and Sarah בֵֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> Ven. shall have a son

וַתְּכַחֵ֨שׁ <S%H3584><s%> vat-te-cha-Chesh denied שָׂרָ֧ה׀ <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah Then Sarah לֵאמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nay צָחַ֖קְתִּי <S%H6711><s%> tza-Chak-ti I laughed כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָרֵ֑אָה <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re-'ah; not for she was afraid וַיֹּ֥אמֶר׀ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo No כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki did צָחָֽקְתְּ׃ <S%H6711><s%> tza-Cha-ket. but thou didst laugh

וַיָּקֻ֤מוּ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Ku-mu rose up מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, And the men וַיַּשְׁקִ֖פוּ <S%H8259><s%> vai-yash-Ki-fu from thence and looked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei toward סְדֹ֑ם <S%H5467><s%> se-Dom; Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> ve-'Av-ra-Ham, and Abraham הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech went עִמָּ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam them לְשַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> le-shal-le-Cham. with them to bring them on the way

וַֽיהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אָמָ֑ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar; said הַֽמְכַסֶּ֤ה <S%H3680><s%> ham-chas-Seh Shall I hide אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I מֵֽאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> me-'av-ra-Ham, from Abraham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that thing which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh. I do

וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> ve-'Av-ra-Ham, Seeing that Abraham הָי֧וֹ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yo will surely יִֽהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol shall surely become a great וְעָצ֑וּם <S%H6099><s%> ve-'a-Tzum; and mighty וְנִ֨בְרְכוּ <S%H1288><s%> ve-Niv-re-chu shall be blessed ב֔וֹ vo, כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> go-Yei and all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְדַעְתִּ֗יו <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tiv, For I know לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'An so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher him that יְצַוֶּ֜ה <S%H6680><s%> ye-tzav-Veh he will command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בָּנָ֤יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his children וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To and his household אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav, after him וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-me-Ru and they shall keep דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do צְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> tze-da-Kah justice וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat; and judgment לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, so הָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> ha-Vi may bring יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- about אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, upon Abraham אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber that which he hath spoken עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. about
